alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Kane; Lee; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 10:24AM CST until February 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and slippery travel expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches are expected. A sharp snowfall gradient is expected across the Chicago metropolitan area and the Illinois River Valley, with the highest amounts farther south. * WHERE...Lee, De Kalb, Kane and Northern Cook Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes on Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Kane; Lee; Northern Cook
